title: AI Snake
description: An AI agent developed for the Snake game using reinforcement learning.

title: Sudoku Solver
description: A Sudoku solver application that uses backtracking to solve puzzles. It also allows loading puzzles from images or selecting games from a database.

title: School Schedule Generator
description: An application for generating school schedules based on user input, ensuring that all classes fit within the available time slots.

title: MLLib
description: A small machine learning library written from scratch and still under development. It focuses on providing basic ML algorithms and utilities.

title: The Ruined World
description: A hack and slash game being developed in Unity. Currently in development, with plans for complex combat mechanics and an engaging story.

title: Book Recommender
description: Simple Book Recommendation System suggests books using collaborative filtering, based on a user's reading history and reviews.
